message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it could really benefit you. Given its value, I'm offering it at $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your desire to stay within budget, Bob.  How about we split the difference from our previous offers?  I could come down to $13,000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to go down to $12,500?
